mapper.insert: MERGE INTO Integration.wiser.productDataHash AS target USING (VALUES(#{productUniqueId}, #{hashCode}, #{lastModifiedDate})) AS source (productUniqueId,hashCode,lastModifiedDate) ON (target.productUniqueId = source.productUniqueId) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET hashCode = source.hashCode, lastModifiedDate = GETDATE() WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (productUniqueId,hashCode,lastModifiedDate) VALUES (source.productUniqueId,source.hashCode,GETDATE());
